@xray_veeo wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 945) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “welcome to ballzakscape-talk to me for info!!”;
}
}
uhm idk if this is it but as u can see theres 2 break’s }
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2008, 04:11:44 pm[/size][hr]either that or something with the misc.randomn talk thing.

item.title: NPChandler.java
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Ok I am making a server (almost a completely blacnk source, its Cheezscape PK 78) and I need help with my NPChandler. I have everything working correctly, except when I add the thing to make the npc’s talk } if (npcs[i].npcType == My NPC here) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1 ) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "My Text Here"; }
The NPC never has the thing its saying portrayed above it. What am I doing wrong?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 19, 2007, 04:45:50 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know?
